thread.section_title: Redding Medical Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redding Medical Inc. | www.reddingmedical.com | 2 of 65
thread.title: Jaime J
thread.title_full: Redding Medical Inc. reviewed by Jaime J

author: Jaime J
title: Jaime J
text: I ordered 2 stethoscope lights from this company and when I received them only one was functional, I emailed them and they responded in a timely manner and sent a replacement for the faulty light the next day. Would recommend this company to my friends and coworkers.
